entries.abort: Yes! We don't belong to you anyways.
entries.angry_disable: Hey, settle down! We can work something out.
entries.arrival_phase_1: The Bez'ox Mentzz should be jumping in any moment now. Intercept and capture that freighter. Those supplies are important to us.
entries.arrival_phase_2: There they are. Intecept and capture the Bez'ox Mentzz. For good measure maybe you should wipe out its escort too.
entries.capture_complete: Escort the Bez'ox Mentzz out of the area. We need that Inhibitor.
entries.capture_phase_1: What are you doing? We are not carrying anything valuable!
entries.capture_phase_2: Ok, well I am yours. I have no wish to be destroyed. You tell me what you want me to do and I will do it!
entries.capture_started: Dantooine Station: < I will inform the Bez'ox Mentzz to alter its route or you will blow it out of the sky. >
entries.complete: We have the Inhibitor. You have been a great help. Now get ready for your next assignment.
entries.failed_destroy: Oh, this is great...just great! We needed that part. Now we are going to have to start all over again.
entries.failed_escape: Oh, this is great...just great! We needed that part. Now we are going to have to start all over again.
entries.panic_1: Look what you did! The owner has a zero tolerance policy on piracy. He is sending his thugs out to blow me up.
entries.panic_3: This is terrible. First I get highjacked and now I am being shot at.
entries.quest_disable_d: Intercept, disable, and capture the Bezox Mentzz.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the Bezox Mentzz through the system. Keep a watch out for the CorSec, who are always watchful of piracy.
entries.quest_location_d: The Bezox Mentzz is traveling through the rich shipping lanes of the Corellia system.
entries.quest_recover_d: After the ship is disabled move in close and wait for the capture process to begin.
entries.recovery_success: Yes! We have the Bez'ox Mentzz on our scanners. Good work, pilot.
entries.split_quest_alert: CorSec fighters detected! Incoming at high speeds. Destroy them all.
entries.target_disabled: Move in close and I will send them a warning. They are going to be coming out to me after all!
entries.taunt_1: Pirates like you don't deserve mercy.
entries.taunt_2: Better we destroy the ship then let you have it.
entries.taunt_3: I don't think you are going to get away with this.
entries.taunt_5: I feel sorry for you...well no I don't.
entries.thanks_1: I will follow you...just keep me safe.
entries.thanks_2: At least I am alive...for now.
entries.thanks_3: Can't you just take the cargo and leave me alone?
entries.thanks_4: I will follow you...just keep me safe.
entries.thanks_5: Can't you just take the cargo and leave me alone?
entries.title: Corellia System: Capture the Bez'ox Mentzz
entries.title_d: The Dantooine station wants the supplies that are being shipped inside the Corellia system on the Bezox Mentzz. Intercept and capture that vessel.
